1370: Badeloghen moved to De Tuyt.D.3 after marriage.
Got married to Barwoud at age 22 in 1370.
Gave birth to Wolbrand in 1370 at age 22.
1371: Gave birth to Gherolf in 1371 at age 23.
1372: Gave birth to Geile in 1372 at age 24.
1373: Gave birth to Claward in 1373 at age 25.
1374: Gave birth to Vais in 1374 at age 26.
1376: Gave birth to Cecilia in 1376 at age 28.
1379: Gave birth to Goneir in 1379 at age 31.
1380: Lost son Gherolf when Gherolf was 10 years old.
1383: Gave birth to Dilane in 1383 at age 35.
1385: Died while giving birth to Reynildis in 1385 at age 37.
